data.text: @DoctorLongscarf Nah. I already pay for HBO Max. I wouldn’t pay more than that.

@DoctorLongscarf It's Warner Brothers, so last year it would have been simultaneous on @HBOMax . And that cost them a lot of money. This year it's a 45 day window, so #TheBatman will be there just after Easter (or just before Eastern Orthodox Easter). Not simultaneous, but a short-ish wait.
@DoctorLongscarf i feel sorry for you man.
@DoctorLongscarf You’re not the only one; I feel the exact same way.
